explains: adj. [医]后天的；已获得的；已成习惯的
v. 取得；捕获（acquire 的过去分词）
wordGroup: acquired immunodeficiency syndrome 获得性免疫缺陷综合症；爱滋病
acquired immune deficiency syndrome 艾滋病；获得性免疫缺陷综合症
acquired immunity [医]后天免疫；获得免疫性
acquired resistance 获得性耐药；获得抗病性

sentences.en: Abstract art is an acquired taste.
sentences.cn: 要慢慢培养才会欣赏抽象艺术。

sentences.en: I've never acquired a taste for wine.
sentences.cn: 我从未养成对葡萄酒的爱好。

sentences.en: I had acquired a smattering of Greek.
sentences.cn: 我学会了一丁点儿希腊文。
